TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbFactory extends System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory

Docs.summary: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of the OLEDB provider's implementation of the data source classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand() cil managed

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code fragment returns a strongly-typed <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instance:
```vb Dim newFactory As OleDbFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance Dim cmd As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OleDbFactory newFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance; DbCommand cmd = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```

.field public static initonly class System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory Instance

Docs.summary: Gets an instance of the . This can be used to retrieve strongly-typed data objects.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code fragment uses the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory.Instance%2A> property to retrieve an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbFactory> instance, and then return a strongly-typed <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> instance:
```vb Dim newFactory As OleDbFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance Dim cmd As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OleDbFactory newFactory = OleDbFactory.Instance; DbCommand cmd = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```
